title: Garten of Banban 2 Directly Download
description:
Continue the story of Banban’s Kindergarten . Delve deeper into the bizarre establishment where the place was left suspiciously empty. Try to survive the unexpected residents, all while uncovering the truth behind the place. It turned out Banban’s Kindergarten had a massive underground facility Who would have thought Unfortunately, your discovery was a painful one, as your curiosity has led to the crashing of your elevator. Meg’s Monster
You must now explore this new region of the facility that you have landed in, uncover the horrifying truth behind the place, and escape with your life. The potential of making friends in Banban’s Kindergarten is endless! The friends that you made in the first Garten of Banban are a mere fraction of the friends to be made, and now that you are stuck in a much deeper chamber after the events of the first game, you are sure to make some more friends

system_requirements.Processor: 2.5 GHz Quad-core Intel or AMD processor
